body_html: The way used in PTB language modeling solves the problem. But it does not look elegant. I wonder if there is any follow-up regarding feeding the previous output of RNN to the current input. I used PyTorch for similar tasks and it seems that their ways of solving it is more elegant.

body: The way used in PTB language modeling solves the problem. But it does not look elegant. I wonder if there is any follow-up regarding feeding the previous output of RNN to the current input. I used PyTorch for similar tasks and it seems that their ways of solving it is more elegant.
